sentences.en: ...fears of an organized attempt to disenfranchise supporters of Father Aristide.
sentences.cn: …对剥夺阿里斯蒂德神父支持者选举权的一次有组织企图的担心。

sentences.en: White supremacists devise new methods to disenfranchise Negroes.
sentences.cn: 白人至上论者想出新的方法以剥夺黑人的公民权。

sentences.en: White supremacists devise new Methods: To disenfranchise Negroes.
sentences.cn: 白人至上论者想出新的方法以剥夺黑人的公民权.

trans.tran_en: to take away someone’s rights, especially their right to vote

trans.tran_cn: 剥夺…的选举权，剥夺…的公民权，终止…的特许权
